tools.name: track_speed_filter
tools.description: Find timestamps where track speed equals or exceeds a minimum threshold.

track_feature.description: A GeoJSON track feature conforming to DebriefTrackFeature schema with LineString or MultiLineString geometry

outputSchema.title: ToolVaultCommand
outputSchema.description: A command returned by a ToolVault tool.

tools.name: track_speed_filter_fast
tools.description: Filter track timestamps using pre-calculated speeds array for fast processing.

track_feature.description: A Track feature conforming to shared-types Track schema, with additional required 'speeds' array in properties

outputSchema.title: ToolVaultCommand
outputSchema.description: A command returned by a ToolVault tool.

tools.name: toggle_first_feature_color
tools.description: Toggle the color property of the first feature in a GeoJSON FeatureCollection.

feature_collection.description: A GeoJSON FeatureCollection object conforming to the Debrief FeatureCollection schema

outputSchema.title: ToolVaultCommand
outputSchema.description: A command returned by a ToolVault tool.

tools.name: word_count
tools.description: Count the number of words in a given block of text.

text.description: The input text block to count words from
text.title: Text
examples: This is a longer text with multiple words to count

outputSchema.title: ToolVaultCommand
outputSchema.description: A command returned by a ToolVault tool.

tools.name: viewport_grid_generator
tools.description: Generate a grid of points within a viewport area at specified intervals.

viewport_state.description: Viewport state containing bounds as [west, south, east, north] in decimal degrees

lat_interval.description: Latitude interval between grid points in decimal degrees
lat_interval.title: Lat Interval

lon_interval.description: Longitude interval between grid points in decimal degrees
lon_interval.title: Lon Interval

outputSchema.title: ToolVaultCommand
outputSchema.description: A command returned by a ToolVault tool.

tools.name: fit_to_selection
tools.description: Calculate bounds of features and set viewport to fit them.

features.description: Array of Debrief features to calculate bounds for
features.title: Features

padding.description: Additional padding around bounds as percentage (0.1 = 10%)
padding.title: Padding

outputSchema.title: ToolVaultCommand
outputSchema.description: A command returned by a ToolVault tool.

tools.name: select_feature_start_time
tools.description: Set TimeState current to the earliest timestamp from any feature.

features.description: Array of Debrief features to analyze for timestamps
features.title: Features

outputSchema.title: ToolVaultCommand
outputSchema.description: A command returned by a ToolVault tool.
